DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy safety 12 week oral administration Imidafenacin 0.1mg b.i.d versus Fesoterodine 4mg daily urge incontinence and/or increase urinary frequency associate urgency may occur patient overactive bladder .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Efficacy Safety Between Imidafenacin Fesoterodine Patients With Overactive Bladder
